description: Kangaroo Paw (Anigozanthos 'Joe Joe Red') is an amazing plant species with its unique kangaroo paw shaped flowers of bright red. It is a very hardy plant that requires minimal maintenance, tolerant to both drought and frost. It provides its surrounding with a beautiful best of color and texture, its strap-like leaves rustling in the wind adding more interest to the landscape. This tough species is a great choice for rockeries and container gardens. All year long, it's hard for anyone to miss its prominently blooming, colorful flowers. Its low-growing habit make it an excellent ground cover, and a stunning addition to any garden!
